Okay so after all the comments going back and forth; half saying "Oh yeah this torrent rocks" the other half saying it sucks, then the dang poster talking about how all the bad comments are from one guy, here is my verdict:

Audio is fine, Video really is bad. I'm not sure what happened - I think the guy was trying, but it's honestly not worth downloading. I'm not normally picky for video or anything - but if I were you I'd download another one.
Video is choppy, audio is great, movie is a must-see. The video problems aren't terrible and this is definitely the best copy on TPB.
